::Spears::

"By pod.  Ramulus is going to my pod and use what he can for parts to 
fix the ark.  He and I were talking about what to do totha ark and I 
suggested he use the parts from my pod to aid in repairs.  That's why 
we made the trip in the first place."

> ::Striker::
>

while. My 
> ship crashed trying to save an alien space station from some 
Predacons."
> 
> He looks at her again, "How did you arrive?"
